author: Special Correspondent
text:
Elangovan (45), Head of the Department of Microbiology, Government Mohan Kumaramangalam Medical College, was killed in a road accident in the city on late Friday evening.

Elangovan residing in Narasodhipatti was proceeding on a two-wheeler to the new bus stand from Ammapettai, when the vehicle involved in a head-on collision with another two-wheeler near the Gandhi Stadium. Elangovan was thrown off his two-wheeler and died on the spot.

Injured

Srinivasan (29), who was riding the other two-wheeler, too suffered serious injuries and was admitted to the Government Mohan Kumaramangalam Medical College Hospital.

The Traffic Investigation Wing police are investigating.

Elangovan was

HoD of Microbiology at

the government medical college
title: Man killed in accident
